project_abstract.cdata: The principal objective of the Dalian Port Project is to assist the Government in the effort to relieve congestion and increase the handling capacity in the ports subsector.  The project provides for infrastructure development in a key port in northeastern China, as well as technical assistance and training to strengthen the port's management and improve its operating capabilities and to address intermodal aspects of port operations.  To that end, the proposed project consists of:  (a) construction of two container berths and two general purpose berths capable of conversion to container berths as and when needed, together with the necessary infrastructure such as dredging, reclamation, pavement, roadways, railways, water supply and sewerage systems.  The project also involves (b) provision of the required loading/unloading equipment, navigational aids and some harbor operation equipment and boats; and (c) provision of training and technical assistance for port planning, construction supervision, financial management, and preparation of two studies:  one for updating the port's Master Plan and the other for intermodal distribution containers in the hinterland of Dalian.

P003491.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>大连港项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是协助大连市政府努力缓解港口拥堵状况，增加港口吞吐能力。项目为中国东北地区主要港口大连港建设基础设施，向其提供技术援助和培训，旨在加强港口管理，提高港口运营能力，处理港口多式联运问题。为此，项目安排了以下内容：（1）建设两个集装箱泊位和两个在必要情况下可以改造为集装箱泊位的一般泊位，同时建设必要配套基础设施，如疏浚、开垦和路面设施以及公路、铁路、供水和污水系统；（2）提供所需装卸设备、导航设备以及一些港口运营设备和船只；（3）就港口规划、施工监理、财务管理和两项研究的准备工作提供培训和技术援助。两项研究分别为大连港总体规划更新研究和大连腹地集装箱多式联运研究。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
